shop.name: shop
shop.description: Open the shop to buy items.

inventory.name: inventory
inventory.description: Show your egg inventory or another user's.

leaderboard.name: leaderboard
leaderboard.description: Check the top collectors and strongest hives.

global.name: leaderboard global
global.description: Display how the server stands compared to others globally.

encyclopedia.name: encyclopedia
encyclopedia.description: Show all eggs and their stats.

collect.name: collect
collect.description: Collect a spawned egg from the channel.

eggs.name: eggs
eggs.description: Manage your egg collection (list, info, destroy).

info.name: eggs info
info.description: Show detailed information about an egg you own.

destroy.name: eggs destroy
destroy.description: Permanently destroy an egg in your inventory.

list.name: eggs list
list.description: List all eggs in your inventory.

hatch.name: eggs hatch
hatch.description: Hatch an egg to get a xenomorph. Requires an available hive slot.

sell.name: eggs sell
sell.description: Sell an egg from your inventory for credits.

collect.name: eggs collect
collect.description: Collect a finished hatch (uses autocomplete to pick ready hatches).

nextspawn.name: nextspawn
nextspawn.description: Show time until the next egg spawn for this server.

stats.name: hive stats
stats.description: Show hive stats (optional: view another user's hive).

delete.name: hive delete
delete.description: Permanently delete your hive and all its data.

type-info.name: hive type-info
type-info.description: Show information about hive types and their requirements.

events.name: hive events
events.description: Show recent events in your hive (battles, evolutions, etc).

defend.name: hive defend
defend.description: Defend against an ongoing attack on your hive.

modules.name: hive modules
modules.description: View modules and their current levels.

upgrade-module.name: hive upgrade-module
upgrade-module.description: Upgrade a hive module to improve your hive's stats.

queen-status.name: hive queen-status
queen-status.description: Check the status of your hive queen (production, bonded xenomorph).

upgrade-queen.name: hive upgrade-queen
upgrade-queen.description: Upgrade your queen chamber to increase jelly output.

start.name: evolve start
start.description: Start an evolution for one of your xenomorphs.

list.name: evolve list
list.description: List all your xenomorphs and their evolution status.

info.name: evolve info
info.description: Show detailed information about an ongoing evolution.

info.name: info
info.description: Show system, tech, and global stats.

vote.name: vote
vote.description: Vote for the bot on top.gg.

setup.name: setup
setup.description: Manage bot settings for this server

channel.name: setup channel
channel.description: Set the channel where eggs will spawn

reset.name: setup reset
reset.description: Reset server settings or a user to defaults

spawn-rate.name: setup spawn-rate
spawn-rate.description: Set spawn rate bounds in seconds (min/max)

egg-limit.name: setup egg-limit
egg-limit.description: Set maximum eggs that can spawn at once

avatar.name: setup avatar
avatar.description: Set a server-specific bot avatar (attachment or URL)

message-delete.name: setup message-delete
message-delete.description: Toggle deleting the spawn message after it is caught

forcespawn.name: forcespawn
forcespawn.description: Force spawn eggs in the configured channel (admin only)

egg.name: give egg
egg.description: Give a user a specified egg type

devget.name: devget
devget.description: Get runtime config or env value (owner only)

devset.name: devset
devset.description: Set config value and update runtime (owner only)

previewjoin.name: previewjoin
previewjoin.description: Preview the guild join embed in this channel (owner only)

checkcommands.name: checkcommands
checkcommands.description: Check whether slash commands are registered in this guild

devgive.name: devgive
devgive.description: Give credits or eggs to a user (owner only)

credits.name: devgive credits
credits.description: Give credits to a user (owner only)

egg.name: devgive egg
egg.description: Give eggs to a user (owner only)

trade.name: trade
trade.description: Trade eggs or xenomorphs with another player.

gift.name: gift
gift.description: Gift an egg or xenomorph to another player.
